title: mAdhava lOkaAnam
sahitya:
mAdhava lOkAnam nUnam mAmakOdaya nidAnam


caraNam 1    api parama yOcitO hrdi mOda suparitO aishati cArthita yEya jaladavatavita
    caraNam 2    svajanOpadAm mitAmapi mAnayati mahitAm madupAyanavadahO madanOjanayitA
    caraNam 3    navatOya dharAbhE bhavatu sArasanAbhE mama sadA matirahO prEmabhAra bharita
